content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: The problem is good and interesting.

This is nothing more than remove the "AM" or "PM" at the end of the input string.
print(input()[:-2])

If you wanted 12-hour to 24-hour conversion, you would have to include a time after 1 PM.

I like this, that's a nice clash idea.

Something I would nitpick before validation however, is that you've put the goal in the Input field.
The Input should probably be something like "<<Line 1:>> A 12-hour formatted string", and same with the output.

Also, the test cases are good, but the validators don't match their associated tests; this is easy to fix in your case, you can just make the validator have the same hour, but only change the minutes (validators are there to prevent hardcoding, not to cover other cases).

Other than that, that's a nice puzzle; it has my upvote.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It's actually very clear and interesting.
Thanks for the feedback. I'm glad that you liked the idea. I'll change the validator right now :)
